jobs.title: Backend Developer (Golang)
jobs.description: HomeServicesAbout usShowcaseBlogsClientsContactCareersService RequestBackend Developer (Golang)BackThe RoleAs a Backend Developer, you will be responsible for– Translating customer and partner requirements into high-quality code– Contributing to the development of a robust and secure API– Maintaining the performance and reliability of the API, which supports frontend, partner applications, and end-user systemsThe backend is fully built in Go, with technologies including MongoDB, Keycloak, and a ...
requirements: HomeServicesAbout usShowcaseBlogsClientsContactCareersService RequestBackend Developer (Golang)BackThe RoleAs a Backend Developer, you will be responsible for– Translating customer and partner requirements into high-quality code– Contributing to the development of a robust and secure API– Maintaining the performance and reliability of the API, which supports frontend, partner applications, and end-user systemsThe backend is fully built in Go, with technologies including MongoDB, Keycloak, and a resilient, redundant infrastructureOngoing projects include:– Migrating to a new infrastructure– Redesigning our security protocolResponsibilities– Push your limits, continuously learn, and engage in constructive technical discussions– Collaborate and share knowledge to elevate the team– Significant freedom to influence the technical direction of the platform– Play a key role in growing the technical team over time– Code quality is a top priority:+ Participate in regular code reviews+ Work using agile workflows (Scrum)What are we looking for

– Minimum 3 years of experience as a backend developer or related technical role– Experience with Go (Golang) is a strong plus– Passion for programming beyond a job– Familiarity with React is a plus– Proficiency in using GIT for version control– Solid understanding of RESTful API principles– Bachelor’s degree or equivalent working/thinking level– Strong drive to learn and share knowledge– Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team– High attention to code quality and best practices– A sense of ownership and accountability– A proactive mindset and a hands-on attitudePersonal Qualities:– We are looking for an open-minded, communicative team player who brings energy and initiative to the table– You think from the user’s perspective, always seeking to improve the system and add value– You embrace challenges, demonstrate persistence and ambition, and maintain a healthy sense of humor– Pragmatic mindset with strong analytical skills to efficiently tackle problems– Fluency in English is requiredBenefits:Salary & Allowances:– Salary:negotiable
– Sponsorship for advanced training and professional skill enhancement

jobs.title: Junior Data Analyst
jobs.description: HomeServicesAbout usShowcaseBlogsClientsContactCareersService RequestJunior Data AnalystBackResponsibilities:– Gather and consolidate requirements between users and the system.– Analyze, consult, and optimize system-related solutions.– Develop processes and perform functional testing based on requirements.– Analyze data from system sources to evaluate the accuracy and effectiveness of the system after new features are implemented.– Collect, process, and analyze large datasets from various source...
requirements: HomeServicesAbout usShowcaseBlogsClientsContactCareersService RequestJunior Data AnalystBackResponsibilities:– Gather and consolidate requirements between users and the system
– Develop processes and perform functional testing based on requirements
– Collaborate with clients and internal teams to understand data requirements and provide analytical support
– At least 1 year of experience in a relevant position
– Sponsorship for advanced training and professional skill enhancement
